snippet: As employers demand more skills, many people are turning to online certificate programs to acquire a specific expertise that can lead them to a job or a promotion.
abstract: Many people are turning to online certificate programs to acquire a specific expertise that can lead them to a job or a promotion as employers demand more skills; certificate coursework can in many cases be applied toward a master's degree.
lead_paragraph: As employers demand more skills, many people are turning to online certificate programs to acquire a specific expertise that can lead them to a job or a promotion.

headline.seo: Online Certificate Programs at Colleges and Universities Gain Popularity
headline.main: Online Certificate Programs at Colleges and Universities Gain Popularity
